requestBody.description: page can be omitted if completed is set to true. completed can be omitted, and will be set accordingly depending on the page passed and the total number of pages in the book.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

parameters.name: zero_based

info.description:
Komga offers 2 APIs: REST and OPDS.

Both APIs are secured using HTTP Basic Authentication.
info.title: Komga API
